label: Genes and orthologs
definition:
• This stanza is based on the pre-calculated MBGD ortholog clustering result (using the default organism set).
  • Each gene of the specified organism is clustered into specific ortholog groups.
  • Each ortholog group is assigned with a functional category and a representative description of gene functions.
  • The ortholog ID is colored according to the assigned functional category.
author: Hiroyo NISHIDE
